bigText: Version 5 is a complete rewrite. Designed for modern workflows, built on top of Lenis, and optimized for production.
smallText: This library has evolved considerably over the years. From jQuery to vanilla ES6, from custom engines to Lenis foundation.

items.title: Built on top of Lenis
items.description: Latest stable release with improved touch handling and performance fixes. No more greedy CSS transforms!

items.title: TypeScript First
items.description: Fully typed. Better autocomplete, fewer bugs, happier developers.

items.title: Dual Intersection Observers
items.description: Separate observers for simple triggers vs. continuous animations. No wasted RAF cycles.

items.title: Smart Touch Detection
items.description: Parallax auto-disabled on mobile. Opt-in with one attribute.

items.title: Production Ready
items.description: Accessible by default. Native scrollbar, keyboard nav, and proper cleanup for SPAs.
